column2: ggplot(mapaES) + geom_sf(aes(fill = TotalA), color = "black", size = 0.2) + scale_fill_continuous(low="ivory", high="darkgreen",labels = scales::label_comma(big.mark = "."), guide = guide_colorbar(frame.colour = "black", ticks.colour = "gray57")) + theme_void() + labs(title = "Censo Ganadero por Comunidad Autónoma (2020)", fill="Nº de cabezas") + theme(plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 11))
